00020         private MedicineViewModel _ItemSelected;
00021         public MedicineViewModel SelectedMedication
00022         {
00023             get
00024             {
00025                 return _ItemSelected;
00026             }
00027             set
00028             {
00029                 if (_ItemSelected != value)
00030                 {
00031                     _ItemSelected = value;
00032                     OnPropertyChanged("ItemSelected");
00033                 }
00034             }
00035         }

00037         public ICommand AddDummyMed
00038         {
00039             get
00040             {
00041                 return new Command(() => {
00042                     Debug.WriteLine("möp");
00043                     Reload();
00044                 });
00045             }
00046         }
00047

00049         public ICommand DeleteListItem { 
00050             get {
00051                 
00052                 return new Command((sender) =>
00053                 {
00054                     Debug.WriteLine("Pls");
00055                     DeleteListItemMethod((MedicineViewModel)sender);
00056                 });
00057             }
00058         }
00059 
00060         public ICommand RefreshMedicationList {
00061             get {
00062                 return new Command(() => {
00063                     MedicationListIsRefreshing = true;
00064                     Reload();
00065                     MedicationListIsRefreshing = false;
00066                 });
00067             }}
00068 
00069         private bool _isRefreshing = false;
00070         public bool MedicationListIsRefreshing
00071         {
00072             get { return _isRefreshing; }
00073             set
00074             {
00075                 _isRefreshing = value;
00076                 OnPropertyChanged(nameof(MedicationListIsRefreshing));
00077             }
00078         }
00079 
00080         private bool isVisible = true;
00081         public bool MedicationListIsVisible
00082         { get { return isVisible; } }
00083 
00084         public MedicationViewModel()
00085         {
00086             this.MedicationsList = new ObservableCollection<MedicineViewModel>();
00087 
00088             foreach (IMedication med in ModelFacade.GetAllMedications())
00089             {
00090                 MedicationsList.Add(new MedicineViewModel(med));
00091             }
00092 
00093             MessagingCenter.Subscribe<DetailedMedicineViewModel>(this, "SavedMedication", sender => {
00094                 Reload();
00095             });
00096         }
00097 
00098         public void DeleteListItemMethod(object sender)
00099         {
00100             var MedicationItem = ((MedicineViewModel)sender);
00101             MedicationsList.Remove(MedicationItem);
00102             ModelFacade.Delete(MedicationItem.Medication);
00103         }
00104 
00105         public void Reload()
00106         {
00107             MedicationsList.Clear();
00108             foreach (IMedication med in ModelFacade.GetAllMedications())
00109             {
00110                 MedicationsList.Add(new MedicineViewModel(med));
00111             }
00112         }

00115     }
